dct_title_s: Carte encyprotype de l'Afrique : dédiée et présentée a S.A.R. Monsieur, Comte d'Artois.
dct_description_sm: 1 map on 4 sheets : color; 96 x 127 cm

par H. Brué, ingénieur géographe ; Scale approximately 1:10,000,000 ; Prime meridian: Paris ; Relief shown by hachures ; Sheets numbered 22, 23, 24, 25. ; Inset maps: Ile de France : réduite de la Carte du Voyage de Mr. Hilbert. Scale 1:300,000 -- Ile Bourbon : réduite de la Carte de Mr. Bory de Saint-Vincent. Scale ca. 1:330,000 ; Detached from A.H. Brue : Grand atlas universel, ou collection de cartes encyprotypes, générales et détaillées des cinq parties du monde ; Paris : Chez Desray : Chez J. Goujon; Source: Brué, Adrien Hubert, 1786-1832. Grand atlas universel ... Paris : Chez Desray ; Chez J. Goujon, 1816, plate 22-plate 25.
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
